Text.Page:
Want to howl with the wolves?

During the event, Corsairs' Stronghold will be infested by wolves every Friday, Saturday, and Sunday from 8 PM to 11 PM (CEST)!

Take your place on the battleground and collect their teeth as trophies. In exchange for them, I'll give you some handy items. Those teeth will make a pretty necklace for my alpha female... um, for my wife.
